title: Tales of Zestiria the Cross (Tales of Zestiria the X)
synopsis: The Celestial Records speak of the existence of the "Seraphim," a race of divine beings who give blessings to humanity and are offered prayers by them in return. Those who are anointed with the ability to interact with these spirits are known as "Shepherds." Hailed as heroes for their prompt appearances in times of crisis, while also being feared for their power, the Shepherds are imprinted in common folklore along with the Seraphim.
related_anime: ['Tales of Zestiria: Doushi no Yoake', 'Tales of Zestiria the Cross: Saiyaku no Jidai', 'Tales of Zestiria: Michibiki no Toki', 'Tales of Zestiria the Cross 2nd Season', 'Tales of HR']
